images.mining.codebook

Class GenericHistogramUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • images.mining.codebook.GenericHistogramUtil

  • public class GenericHistogramUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generates a quantized dataset representation from the specified codebook and the specified descriptor files, while ignoring files specified in a separate tabu file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      GenericHistogramUtil(java.io.File target, boolean recursive, int descLen)
